title: Spear of Thunder – Etranger of the Sky - Novel Updates
tags: Demon Lord   Goddesses   Heroes   Male Protagonist
author: Makimura Eiri   牧村エイリ
description: “Let’s be together,” she said… 'We’ll never be apart,' she said. I couldn’t refuse her... because it was an invitation from an extraordinary beautiful girl. And like an idiot, I nodded. I never thought it’d be the trap of a stubborn woman. When I woke up, I realized that the world I lived in hadn't changed. The only thing that was different was that the natural enemy of humans existed. And then, I become a representative of a goddess.>
